notes: Partial implementation: structure and API complete, but requires operator norm theory and eigenvalue infrastructure from mathlib. Left as sorry placeholders. The proofs require: (1) operator norm characterization via supremum, (2) eigenvalue existence for symmetric matrices, (3) spectral theorem relating eigenvalues to Rayleigh quotient supremum. These are deep results in functional analysis.
